column7: Exposure fusion with TuFuse or enfuse. Automatic detection of image stacks.
Exposure fusion with enfuse or TuFuse. *) Pro version only.
Exposure fusion with enfuse, automatic detection of image stacks.
Supports 16-bit camera raw input via WIC plugins
(*) color mapping around the seams allows to preserve the original photometric properties of the images

column8: *) Circular fish eyes not supported,[33] diagonal fish eyes up to 180 degree field of view.
Also supports motorized panoramic heads, in Giga & Pro versions.
* As of v2010.2 onwards, all known fish eye projections are supported (equisolid, orthographic, stereographic)
One shot i.e. panoramic mirror lenses also supported.
(*) homographic model compensates for these type of lenses
